languages.text: Череп легендарного пирата Лакшима Выродка, терроризировавшего Простор Коронус три века назад, был добыт в абордажном бою почтенной Теодорой фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Череп легендарного пирата Лакшима Выродка, терроризировавшего Простор Коронус три века назад, был добыт в абордажном бою почтенной Теодорой фон Валанциус.

languages.text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Череп легендарного пирата Лакшима Выродка, терроризировавшего Простор Коронус три века назад, был добыт в абордажном бою почтенной Теодорой фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorized the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスを3世紀にわたって恐怖に陥れた伝説の海賊、ラクシム・ザ・フリークの頭蓋骨だ。尊敬受けしシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの乗船攻撃により死亡した。
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスを3世紀にわたって恐怖に陥れた伝説の海賊、ラクシム・ザ・フリークの頭蓋骨だ。尊敬受けしシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの乗船攻撃により死亡した。

languages.text: 这件头骨属于传奇海盗“怪人拉克希姆”，他曾在三百年前为科罗努斯扩区带来了无数噩梦。尊敬的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯在某次登舰作战中，获得了这件战利品。
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 这件头骨属于传奇海盗“怪人拉克希姆”，他曾在三百年前为科罗努斯扩区带来了无数噩梦。尊敬的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯在某次登舰作战中，获得了这件战利品。

languages.text: La calavera del legendario pirata Lakshim el Brutal, que aterrorizó la Extensión de Koronus hace tres siglos. La estimada Theodora von Valancius se la cobró en un abordaje.
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: La calavera del legendario pirata Lakshim el Brutal, que aterrorizó la Extensión de Koronus hace tres siglos. La estimada Theodora von Valancius se la cobró en un abordaje.

languages.text: Le crâne de Lakshim le Monstrueux, un pirate légendaire qui sema la terreur dans les Étendues de Koronus il y a de cela trois siècles, arraché au reste de son corps par nulle autre que l'honorable Théodora von Valancius.
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Le crâne de Lakshim le Monstrueux, un pirate légendaire qui sema la terreur dans les Étendues de Koronus il y a de cela trois siècles, arraché au reste de son corps par nulle autre que l'honorable Théodora von Valancius.

languages.text: Der Schädel des legendären Piraten Lakshim der Freak, der vor drei Jahrhunderten die Koronus-Ausdehnung terrorisiert hat. Er wurde bei einem Überfall der geschätzten Theodora von Valancius erobert.
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Der Schädel des legendären Piraten Lakshim der Freak, der vor drei Jahrhunderten die Koronus-Ausdehnung terrorisiert hat. Er wurde bei einem Überfall der geschätzten Theodora von Valancius erobert.

languages.text: Üç yüzyıl önce Koronus Enginliği'nde terör estiren efsanevi korsan Ucube Lakshim'in kafatası. Saygıdeğer Theodora von Valancius, bu kafatasını bir bordalama saldırısında ele geçirmişti.
languages.original_text: The skull of the legendary pirate Lakshim the Freak, who terrorised the Koronus Expanse three centuries ago. It was claimed in a boarding attack by the esteemed Theodora von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Üç yüz yıl önce Koronus Enginliği'nde terör estiren efsanevi korsan Ucube Lakshim'in kafatası. Saygıdeğer Theodora von Valancius, bu kafatasını bir bordalama saldırısında ele geçirmişti.
